statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects;
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date, end_date, project_id FROM human_rights_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM human_rights_projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM human_rights_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_projects WHERE budget < 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT * FROM human_rights_projects WHERE budget >= 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 15000 ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT project_name, CONCAT('Budget: ', budget) AS budget_info, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS project_duration_in_days FROM human_rights_projects ORDER BY project_duration_in_days DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Child%' ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT * FROM human_rights_projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM human_rights_projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, contribution_amount FROM project_contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 5000;
SELECT contributor_name, project_name FROM project_contributors JOIN human_rights_projects ON project_contributors.project_id = human_rights_projects.project_id;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM human_rights_projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM human_rights_projects WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30' AND budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM project_contributors WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;

SELECT project_name, budget, start_date, end_date, contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM human_rights_projects JOIN project_contributors ON human_rights_projects.project_id = project_contributors.project_id WHERE budget > 10000 AND contribution_amount >= 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, allocated_funds FROM projects
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM activities
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT participant_name, project_name, role FROM participants
SELECT project_id, project_name, allocated_funds FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE spent_funds > 500;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants WHERE project_id = 2 AND allocation_status = true;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS num_activities FROM activities GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_type FROM donors WHERE donor_type = 'Individual';
SELECT project_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM projects INNER JOIN donations ON projects.project_id = donations.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects p JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT donor_name, donor_type, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donors d JOIN donations dn ON d.donor_id = dn.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name, donor_type;

SELECT project_name, start_date, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects p JOIN donations dn ON p.project_id = dn.project_id JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id GROUP BY project_name, start_date;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM projects WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM projects WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE total_budget > 10000;
SELECT funders.funder_name, donations.donation_amount FROM funders JOIN donations ON funders.funder_id = donations.funder_id;
SELECT project_name, achievement_title, achievement_description FROM projects JOIN achievements ON projects.project_id = achievements.project_id WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
